transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Good afternoon here I am meeting madam here I am meeting.
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: Sir, sir, a small help sir.
Executive: What to do ma'am, your ID number is there, ma'am, you could have called me directly, customer care has gone and come.
Customer: No sir, no, no, what is it because of that sir?
Executive: No ma'am, because of that, a query will rise on our company, that's why I am saying.
Customer: Query rises after that only I can reach out, that's why I am saying.
Executive: No, no, I say, no, number is there, I, phone problem because of that, again I, correctly what to save, I don't know, I can't take it.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay, okay.
Customer: That is it sir, there is nothing else, nothing else, customer, okay, okay sir. Customer, regular customer only one person, from us stock always taking person only.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Payment I am putting, telling and send the product telling, finally without sending, they left, now if I call, phone is not taking, cut and leaving like that problem is there sir, any solution will be there?
Executive: Okay ma'am, system only going to you, give me details only, that conversion part your side only can do.
Customer: Okay sir, okay sir.
Executive: So that you only have to do, still my side anything try can do means I am trying and seeing.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: System only going to call means 3 o'clock can call you?
Customer: Ah, definitely call sir, no problem.
Executive: Okay ma'am, before that this query close can do ma'am, our query one rise is there, no?
Customer: Can do sir, can do sir, no problem.
Executive: Okay ma'am, this query rise after that only you will get, see here one app open means ma'am, go and click means right hand side one bell icon will be there.
Customer: Okay okay sir, okay okay.
Executive: See we will, I am 3 o'clock only closing, your query I am clearing and giving process.
Customer: Okay okay, ah, after doing send it sir, okay.
Executive: Okay ma'am, okay. Thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs help with a payment issue.

- The seller is not sending product after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for details to check the issue.

- Executive assured to try from their end.

- Executive will call back at 3 o'clock.

- Executive asked to close the query.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 o'clock.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, product, query, call back
